Text: Thank you!  I've been waiting all night for the "500MB" version.  200MB is great for a cell phone or iPad, but way to grainy for a 40" 1080P set.  And 1GB is overkill for any format in this day and age.  You are my new hero.

Thank you so much for an .avi file.
I'm so sick of seeing .mkv files, there trash and don't work on a 360.
^  Not everyone watches TV on their Windows PC.  Many standalone players don't do MKV, nor do some portable *computers*.

Thanks a lot, great quality worth the size. 
A-9  V-9
Even compatible with subs
